github.releaseNotes: git log --pretty=format:'* %s (%h)' $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2>/dev/null || git rev-list --max-parents=0 HEAD)...HEAD

after:release: echo 'To publish to Chrome Web Store, run manually:'
echo 'npx chrome-webstore-upload upload --source build/ --extension-id YOUR_EXTENSION_ID --client-id YOUR_CLIENT_ID --client-secret YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET --refresh-token YOUR_REFRESH_TOKEN'
